definition: A large retail establishment where customers can purchase a wide variety of groceries, household items, and other consumer goods. It is commonly used to refer to a specific type of store that offers a convenient one-stop shopping experience for everyday necessities.

examples.german: Ich gehe heute in den Supermarkt.
examples.english: I am going to the supermarket today.

examples.german: Der Supermarkt hat bis 22 Uhr geöffnet.
examples.english: The supermarket is open until 10 PM.

examples.german: Ich kaufe immer frisches Obst im Supermarkt.
examples.english: I always buy fresh fruits at the supermarket.

examples.german: Im Supermarkt gibt es eine große Auswahl an Produkten.
examples.english: The supermarket offers a wide range of products.

examples.german: Der Supermarkt ist um die Ecke.
examples.english: The supermarket is around the corner.
